DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , open , mono-center , randomize , two part study 4-way cross-over design study part . The objective study investigate blood glucose level oral intake define amount lactulose .
DOC.brief_title: Blood Glucose Response After Oral Intake Lactulose Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Age : 1865 year Approx . 35 bowel movement per week Caucasian Availability presence trial unit approx . 4 hours/ week 4 time row approx . 1 week washout Signed informed consent form Known ( family ) history diabetes mellitus use antihyperglycaemic drug Insulin Clinically relevant renal hepatic disease , liver enzymes > 10 % reference range Fasting blood glucose > 100 mg/dL HbA1c outside reference range Total cholesterol > 250 mg/dL triglyceride > 150 mg/dL Haemoglobin < 11 g/dL ( woman ) ; < 12.5 g/dL ( men ) BMI < 19 kg/m² ≥ 30 kg/m² Intentional unintentional weight loss > 5 % previous 6 month Smoker Major medical surgical event require hospitalization within previous 3 month Presence disease drug ( ) influence digestion absorption nutrient bowel habit Intake medication know affect glucose tolerance , e.g. , steroid , protease inhibitor antipsychotic ( stable dos e.g. , oral contraceptive , thyroxin , vitamins mineral supplement drug treat hypertension osteoporosis acceptable ) Chronic intake substance affect blood coagulation ( e.g . acetylic acid , anticoagulant , diuretic , thiazide ) , investigator 's opinion would impact volunteer safety Hereditary problem galactose fructose intolerance , lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption Suspicion drug abuse Abuse alcoholic drink , defined average daily intake one litre beer per day equivalent amount alcohol beverage Pregnant breast feed woman Known suspect allergy component investigational product ( ) Known HIVinfection Known acute chronic hepatitis B C infection Blood donation within 4 week prior visit 1 study Volunteer unable cooperate adequately Participation clinical trial investigational product within one month start study
